entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy near noon and ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
